name: Jason Sherrer
text: Typical fuel station pizza. They have other options including burgers, chicken, tacos, etc...fast eats.

name: Josh Church
text: Best pizza in 100 mile radius... Maybe 1,000 mile. Grab a few ranch dressings on the way out the door. A+

name: Paul Helms
text: Hands down the best Pizza in town, with fast and friendly service. Have pepperoni and all meat combo pizzas either by the slice or whole large pizza on hand at all times throughout the day. Call ahead and they’ll have your order ready when you walk in the door or come in to order and watch tv while you wait. You won’t be disappointed.

name: Nichole Freer
text: Not too impressed. One of our pizzas were not fresh and there were dozens of flies everywhere. You could hear the staff use inappropriate language up front and after changing garbage they were not thrown outside they were put in front where …More

name: David Wingerter
text: This place is dirty and doesn't care about quality.  This is why...  I ordered 12 traditional breaded wings.  Ordered them before and they have always came the same way.  Wings in a box and sauce on the side.  Good that way and how …More

name: S S
text: Pizza is pretty good if it hasn't been setting long and has been cooked all the way. I have gotten  their pizza  several times with it doughy.

name: William Stewart
text: Pizza tast good but prices are way way to high

name: Eric Ostdahl
text: Ordered the taco pie. Was excellent.  Will do it again

name: John Haaland
text: cooked just right.

name: Kathie Knudtson
text: That was the best pizza in town. Sure do miss it!!!!

name: rhonda kent
text: The pizza is awesome & so is the staff!

name: Steven Groves
text: Could be more consistent sometimes there overloaded with cheese and sometime the whole top is burnt

name: Zoe Reeves
text: Food is expensive. Staff is friendly.

name: Lone White Wolf
text: Would not recommend eating here. The place is dirty and not well maintained.

text: No longer Godfathers at this location.

text: One of the best pizzas I ever had
